pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ensembles of Caret Models // Functions for creating ensembles of caret models: caretList and caretStack. caretList is a convenience function for fitting multiple caret::train models to the same dataset. caretStack will make linear or non-linear combinations of these models, using a caret::train model as a meta-model, and caretEnsemble will make a robust linear combination of models using a glm.
